info.name: MIGRATED!! Pinkify! Google Docs
info.description: Pinkify! Google Docs DO NOT USE USERSTYLES.ORG! This theme is not continued on this site anymore. Please refer to the instructions document on how to install Stylus and this theme from userstyles.world. Thank you! INSTALLATION AND CUSTOMISATION INSTRUCTIONS Important! This theme is not very accessible! The contrast ratio is not suitable for those with sight problems. If there is demand, I might make a version that has better contrast rations while still looking cute.
